title: Audio: The President's Call to the Crew of the Space Shuttle Atlantis | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 20, 2009

 



Audio: The President's Call to the Crew of the Space Shuttle Atlantis




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  _______________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                      May 20, 2009   Earlier today at 5:45pm the President called the crew of the Space Shuttle Atlantis from the Oval Office. To listen to the audio of this call, please click HERE
